scripts.vercel-build: mkdir -p src/environments && echo 'declare const process: { env: { [key: string]: string | undefined; } }; export const environment = { production: false, apiUrl: process.env["ANGULAR_APP_API_URL"] || "https://api.jsonbin.io/v3/b/67f898a38960c979a582cbbd", apiKey: process.env["ANGULAR_APP_API_KEY"] || "$2a$10$vgCdwcQFiMBCYKAU.MjSIuJCJgovINPU.cbtKW/IXJ0i3pMzn7ALG" };' > src/environments/environment.ts && echo 'declare const process: { env: { [key: string]: string | undefined; } }; export const environment = { production: true, apiUrl: process.env["ANGULAR_APP_API_URL"] || "https://api.jsonbin.io/v3/b/67f898a38960c979a582cbbd", apiKey: process.env["ANGULAR_APP_API_KEY"] || "$2a$10$vgCdwcQFiMBCYKAU.MjSIuJCJgovINPU.cbtKW/IXJ0i3pMzn7ALG" };' > src/environments/environment.prod.ts && ng build
